attributes.action: support the Bill to make members of the House of Lords pay UK tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The House of Lords (Members' Taxation Status) Bill aims to make members of the House of Lords pay tax in this country.

A number of Lords have chosen to avoid UK tax by choosing to be officially domiciled in other countries.  Is it fair that they should continue to have legislative powers - making our laws without paying our taxes?

If the Bill is enacted, no-one will be able to become a member of the House of Lords unless they are resident in the UK for taxation purposes.  Existing members will have to choose to pay UK tax, or take a lifetime leave of absence from the house.
